org-tagline: Ukumela Amalungelo, Ukwakha Ukuqonda, Ukwenza Uguquko
hero-description: I-Albinism Foundation Zambia izinikele ekumeleni amalungelo abantu abane-albinism, ukukhuthaza ukuqonda, kanye nokwakha umphakathi ohlanganisiwe lapho wonke umuntu angaphumelela khona.
mission-statement: Ukumela amalungelo, isithunzi, kanye nokuhlanganiswa kwabantu abane-albinism eZambia ngemikhankaso yokuqwashisa, ukumela imigomo, izinsizakalo zokusekelwa, kanye nezinhlelo zokuqinisa umphakathi.
focus-rights-desc: Ukukhuthaza ushintsho lwemigomo kanye nokuvikelwa komthetho ukuqinisekisa amalungelo alinganayo namathuba kubo bonke abantu abane-albinism.
focus-awareness-desc: Ukufundisa imiphakathi nge-albinism ukulwa nezinganekwane, imibono engalungile, kanye nokucwasa ngezinhlelo eziqondisiwe.
focus-support-desc: Ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ezibalulekile okuhlanganisa ukusabalalisa i-sunscreen, izingubo ezivikela, kanye nokuhlela ukufinyelela ezempilo.
focus-education-desc: Ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane ezine-albinism zinemfundo esezingeni eliphezulu esilungisiwe kanye nensimbi zokusekela.
news-1-title: I-AFZ Iqala Ikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Yezwe Lonke
news-1-excerpt: Ikhankaso yethu ephelele yokuqwashisa ithinta imiphakathi yemaphandleni kulo lonke iZambia ukulwa nokucwasa kanye nokukhuthaza ukuqonda.
news-2-title: Ukunqoba Komgomo: Izinyathelo Ezintsha Zokuvikela Zamukelelwa
news-2-excerpt: Uhulumeni wamukela izinyathelo ezintsha zomthetho zokuvikela abantu abane-albinism ebugebengu nasekucwaseni.
news-3-excerpt: I-AFZ yandelela izinhlelo zokusekelwa kwemfundo ukubandakanya abafundi abangu-200 abane-albinism kuzo zonke izifundazwe.
cta-description: Ndawonye, singakha iZambia lapho abantu abane-albinism baphila ngesithunzi, ukulingana, namathuba.
address: [Ikheli Lehofisi ye-AFZ - Kufanele lishintshelwe ikheli langempela]
